item.title: Just Enough Bazaar to Be Dangerous
item.description: Last year I wrote a blog post about how to migrate away from Bazaar, a distributed version control system, originally developed by Canonical, to git. While I still think this is the only way forward, here, at Canonical, working in the Launchpad team, we still have a couple of Bazaar repositories around, which cannot be easily migrated, as they are both integrated into deployment processes, and used by other teams.
